source.@value:
pipeline "Evaluation - Self-Monitoring Pipeline"
stage 10 match either
rule "Evaluation - Self-Monitoring Cleanup"
stage 0 match either
rule "Evaluation - Self-Monitoring Parser Graylog 1"
rule "Evaluation - Self-Monitoring Parser MongoDB 1"
rule "Evaluation - Self-Monitoring Parser Opensearch 1"
rule "Evaluation - Self-Monitoring Parser Graylog Installer"
end

rule"Evaluation - Self-Monitoring Cleanup"

when
    NOT has_field("event_severity")
    
then
    drop_message();

end

rule"Evaluation - Self-Monitoring Cleanup"

when
    NOT has_field("event_severity")
    
then
    drop_message();

end

default_template.@value:
# Required settings
fields_under_root: true
fields.collector_node_id: ${sidecar.nodeName}
fields.gl2_source_collector: ${sidecar.nodeId}


output.logstash:
   hosts: ["${user.graylog_host}:5044"]
path:
   data: ${sidecar.spoolDir!"/var/lib/graylog-sidecar/collectors/filebeat"}/data
   logs: ${sidecar.spoolDir!"/var/lib/graylog-sidecar/collectors/filebeat"}/log

filebeat.inputs:

- type: filestream
  id: snort-filestream
  enabled: true
  paths:
    - /var/log/snort/alert_json.txt
    - /var/log/snort/appid-output.json
  parsers:
    - ndjson:
        target: "snort3"
        add_error_key: true
        overwrite_keys: true
  fields:
    event_source_product: snort3

- type: filestream
  id: zeek-filestream
  enabled: true
  paths:
    - /opt/zeek/logs/current
  parsers:
    - ndjson:
        target: "zeek"
        add_error_key: true
        overwrite_keys: true
  fields:
    event_source_product: zeek

- type: filestream
  id: apache-filestream
  enabled: true
  paths:
  - /var/log/apache2/access.log
  - /var/log/apache2/error.log
  - /var/log/httpd/access_log
  - /var/log/httpd/error_log
  fields_under_root: true
  fields:
      event_source_product: apache_httpd

# Required settings
fields_under_root: true

fields.gl2_source_collector: ${sidecar.nodeId}


output.logstash:

template.@value:

fields_under_root: true

output.logstash:
   hosts: ["${user.graylog_host}:5044"]

   logs: ${sidecar.spoolDir!"/var/lib/graylog-sidecar/collectors/filebeat"}/log

filebeat.inputs:

- type: filestream

  enabled: true

    - /var/log/snort/appid-output.json
  parsers:

- type: filestream
  id: syslog-filestream
  enabled: true
  paths: 
  - /var/log/syslog
  fields_under_root: true
  fields: 
      event_source_product: syslog

# Required settings
fields_under_root: true
fields.collector_node_id: ${sidecar.nodeName}
fields.gl2_source_collector: ${sidecar.nodeId}


output.logstash:
   hosts: ["localhost:5054"]
path:

   logs: ${sidecar.spoolDir!"/var/lib/graylog-sidecar/collectors/filebeat"}/log
